item.title: Live Updates Animation
item.description: I came across a simple yet beautiful animation in the New York Times app the other day denoting their live updates feed. It has three dots, all with different shades of red, alternating to imply to the user that changes to the story are happening rapidly in real time. I always love challenging myself to get better at animations within SwiftUI, so I set out to recreate this cool little design.
